Posts.Content: Jan 2, 2019 08:05AM - edited Jan 2, 2019 08:05AM by Bubblybubbles_1 hi everyone. My radiation started in December and ends on January 21st. I was diagnosed with stage 2B breast cancer just after 2 days of giving birth to my daughter (it was a csection). I had 8 rounds of chemo, lumpectomy and 14 nodes removal and now radiation. So far, I am doing very well . The skin is getting dry and turning darker but nothing else as far as the side effects.
Posts.Title: Radiation January 2019 egregious egregious
